Contact Us

Stop Monitoring, Start Managing

We'll contact you to help you get started, but in case you're the impatient type:
wget -qO- http://logzilla.sh | sudo bash

Lab/Test Server Requirements

  • 8GB Ram
  • 20GB Disk (more, if you plan to send a lot of data)
  • Ubuntu 14 or 16 LTS x_64 Server)
* Production requirements will vary, we're happy to help you with sizing.
